original_text: Then I saw “a new heaven and a new earth,” for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and there was no longer any sea.
korean_text: 또 내가 새 하늘과 새 땅을 보니 처음 하늘과 처음 땅이 없어졌고 바다도 다시 있지 않더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw "a new heaven and a new earth,"
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 "새 하늘과 새 땅"을 보았으니

sentences.original_text: for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 첫 하늘과 첫 땅이 사라졌고

sentences.original_text: and there was no longer any sea.
